name: AutoSwitchIME
description: 打开需要软件时修改IME，杀软件后切换回来(ImeService需要自己修改)
condition: if(frontPkgChanged == true){if (globalVarOf$Terminals.contains(to)) {ui.showShortToast("enter Terminals,AutoSwitchIME");ui.showShortToast("" + su.exe("ime set org.pocketworkstation.pckeyboard/.LatinIME"));} else if (globalVarOf$Terminals.contains(from)) { ui.showShortToast("exit Terminals,AutoSwitchIME");ui.showShortToast("" + su.exe("ime set com.baidu.input_mi/.ImeService"));}}
